name: Slime Attack: Under Attack By Slimes In Another World?!?
name_original: Slime Attack: Under Attack By Slimes In Another World?!?
description:
Created for Mini Jam 114: Anime with the limitation "Locked In Place".

Story

You are going about your life as usual -- maybe running to the grocery store, or getting ready for work, or just sitting on your couch petting your cat -- when you are suddenly transported to another world! Apparently you're the Chosen One with amazing magic powers, destined to protect the boundary between worlds. Or something.

One problem: something went wrong with the summoning ritual, and you're stuck in the portal.

Well, you can still sling spells from here. Defend the portal from the slimes that threaten to escape and threaten your home!

Instructions

Turn your character with the W, A, and D keys. Fire a projectile with the spacebar. Press Z or the Slow button to temporarily slow down all slimes currently on-screen.

Your character loses health if a slime reaches them, and it's game over if your health hits 0.

Credits

Except as noted below and in CREDITS.txt, all assets were created by the developer within the 72-hour time period for Mini Jam 114.

  • Kenpixel font and variants: Kenney Vleugels (www.kenney.nl), Public Domain/CC0
  • kromasky font: Zingot Games (http://www.zingot.com), CC-BY 4.0
  • Button click: NenadSimic License, CC-BY 3.0
  • Other sound effects: Juhani Junkala, Public Domain/CC0
  • Game Over and Victory (Finale) music: Avgvst, CC-BY 4.0
  • Title screen (Destiny Calls) and main loop (Surprise Attack) music: Trevor Lentz, CC-BY-SA 3.0

See CREDITS.txt for further details.
